Detailed Description

Header file for the IPDR console, as implemented in Common/Console.c.

Id
Console.h,v 1.9 2005/04/21 11:31:22 dmitryk Exp

The file contains data structures / prototypes relating to the IPDR console.

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct IPDR_tag_Console Console
 

structure containing information about the console.

typedef IPDR_Status(* ConsoleCommandFunc)(ConsoleSession *S, FILE *Out,int Argc, const char *const Argv[], void *Context)
 

Function pointer, called by the command interpreter.

Parameters:
S console session (may be NULL)
Out output file/socket (used if S is NULL)
Argc number of arguments
Argv arguments
Context context argument (NULL)
Returns:
IPDR_OK on success; IPDR_STATUS_RETURN_CODE otherwise.

Register a module within the console given the module name and the list of commands supported by the module

Parameters:
C console
ModuleName name of module
ContextArg extra argument passed to the command functions

Returns:
IPDR_OK on success; IPDR_STATUS_RETURN_CODE otherwise.
